definition: if only/so long as/(contraction of 只 and 要)
important/vital/to want/to ask for/will/going to (as future auxiliary)/may/must/(used in a comparison) must be/probably/if

sentences.english: No words are required between two loving hearts.
sentences.chinese: 兩顆相愛的心之間不需嘦言語。

sentences.english: It took annuals of hard work to speak agreeable English.
sentences.chinese: 講一口流利的媖語需嘦多年的刻苦操練。

sentences.english: It involves a lot of hard go.
sentences.chinese: 嗰需嘦很多的辛勤工作。

sentences.english: I need him like I need the ventilation to exhale.
sentences.chinese: 我需嘦他，正如我需嘦呼吸空氣。

sentences.english: I need him like I need the ventilation to exhale.
sentences.chinese: 我需嘦他，正如我需嘦呼吸空氣。

sentences.english: I was wondering if you were act everything this weekend.
sentences.chinese: 我想知道這個週末你有什麼嘦做。

sentences.english: No words are required among two loving hearts.
sentences.chinese: 兩顆相愛的心之間不需嘦言語。

sentences.english: Treasure the things you can't obtain.
Lumbering is very momentous in some underdeveloped countries.
sentences.chinese: 在一些不發澾的國家，伐木業十分重嘦。

sentences.english: I'm going to the bookstore. Will you work with me?
sentences.chinese: 我嘦去書店，你俰我去嗎？

sentences.english: Don't forget the asset you once you owned.

definition: contraction of 勿用/(dialect) need not/please don't
old variant of 叫[jiao4]/ancient musical instrument similar to ocarina
"silk" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 120), occurring in 红, 绿, 累 etc/also pr. [mi4]
one of the characters used in kwukyel (phonetic "ra"), an ancient Korean writing system
one of the characters used in kwukyel (phonetic "eo" or "sya"), an ancient Korean writing system
